entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS, MAINLY THIS MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 60

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
